brand.name: Zipli
brand.primaryCTA: Facilitate efficient redistribution of surplus food

audienceSignals: B2B platform for food industry and municipalities

valueProps.text: Contributes to reducing food waste and achieving sustainability goals
Empowers businesses and municipalities to support local communities and enhance social wellbeing
Streamlines the food donation process, reducing costs and improving compliance

pains: Food waste in the food industry

facts.text: Zipli is a B2B platform designed to reduce food waste.
facts.evidence: Zipli is a B2B platform designed to reduce food waste and improve sustainability within the food industry and municipalities.

facts.text: Zipli provides a mobile app and an AI-powered data platform.
facts.evidence: It provides a mobile app and an AI-powered data platform that facilitates the efficient redistribution of surplus food.

facts.text: Real-Time Food Tracking allows users to post donations or food requests.
facts.evidence: Real-Time Food Tracking: Allows users to post donations or food requests, matching surplus food with those in need instantly.

facts.text: Automated Redistribution Logistics simplifies the logistics of food donations.
facts.evidence: Automated Redistribution Logistics: Simplifies the logistics of food donations, ensuring compliance with food donation regulations.

facts.text: AI-Powered Insights offer actionable insights and auto-generated reports.
facts.evidence: AI-Powered Insights: Offers actionable insights and auto-generated reports for tracking ESG metrics.

facts.text: The mobile app provides a user-friendly interface for food matchmaking.
facts.evidence: Mobile App: Provides a user-friendly interface for everyday food matchmaking between food providers and receivers.

facts.text: Zipli helps businesses lower disposal costs.
facts.evidence: Cost Reduction: Helps businesses lower disposal costs and improve their brand image by contributing to social good.

facts.text: Zipli targets cities and municipalities to meet food waste reduction goals.
facts.evidence: Cities and Municipalities: Aims to help local governments meet food waste reduction goals and enhance social wellbeing.

facts.text: Zipli supports HoReCa & Retail in building responsible brands.
facts.evidence: HoReCa (Hotels, Restaurants, and Cafés) & Retail: Supports businesses in building responsible brands by automating food donation processes.

facts.text: Zipli assists food producers in turning surplus food into savings.
facts.evidence: Food Producers: Assists in turning surplus food into savings and ensuring compliance with food donation rules.

facts.text: Zipli provides charities and upcyclers with reliable access to surplus food.
facts.evidence: Charities and Upcyclers: Provides reliable access to surplus food, reducing sourcing stress and enabling impactful food innovations.

facts.text: Zipli contributes to reducing food waste and achieving sustainability goals.
facts.evidence: Environmental Impact: Contributes to reducing food waste and achieving sustainability goals.

facts.text: Zipli empowers businesses and municipalities to support local communities.
facts.evidence: Social Responsibility: Empowers businesses and municipalities to support local communities and enhance social wellbeing.

facts.text: Zipli streamlines the food donation process, reducing costs and improving compliance.
facts.evidence: Operational Efficiency: Streamlines the food donation process, reducing costs and improving compliance.
